overview: Brandy Peterson joined FishNet Security in June of 1998 and has 12 years of experience in the industry. Currently, Mr. Peterson is the CTO of FishNet Security and is responsible for 24x7 customer support, internal IT and security technology leadership of FishNet Security. Mr. Petersonâ€™s previous roles included director of technology and systems engineer, both positions within FishNet Security. Mr. Peterson earned his Bachelor of Science degree in mechanical engineering from Kansas State University and holds a CISSP technical certification.
